Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the events within a circus, focusing on Paul Bunyan's performance, a conflict with a disgruntled former strongman, and the subsequent chaos and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Arrival and Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan's circus act and the arrival of spectators, setting the stage for the circus environment.

narrative_arcs.title: Circus Spectators Arrive and React to a Giraffe

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Billings/Grasso
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the initial confrontation with Billings, later revealed as Matto Grasso, and the escalating threat involving a pistol.

narrative_arcs.title: Responding to a Cry for Help and Confronting Billings
Billings' Display of Superhuman Strength and Attack
Pistol Threat and Escalation of Danger
Continuing Threats from Billings and the Pistol Man
Exposition on Matto Grasso and Circus Conflict
Proposal to Become the New Strong Man

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan's Rise and Grasso's Revenge Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Paul Bunyan taking over as the strongman and Matto Grasso plotting revenge, leading to chaos in the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Debut and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Ape Mayhem and The Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Grasso's second revenge attempt by releasing an ape, leading to a chaotic chase through the circus arena.

narrative_arcs.title: Chase Enters the Arena and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Fight with Sonny and Bunyan's Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in a fight between Matto Grasso (as Paul Bunyan) and Sonny, ending with Paul Bunyan deciding to leave the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto's Turn and Dominance in the Fight
The Trapeze Toss and Sonny's Protest
Sonny's Aerial Peril and Trapeze Rescue
Job Offer and Paul's Woodland Yearning

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and The Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's adventure involving a talking severed head, a rescue mission, and a confrontation with the Ogress of Tibet.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Marco Polo and the Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo and his legendary adventures, quickly shifting to a gruesome discovery of a talking severed head.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Adventures and the Ogress of Tibet
Ghastly Discovery of a Severed Head

sub_scenes.title: Rescue, Reward, and Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco Polo's rescue of the talking head, receiving a magical dagger, and leading to a deceptive encounter at a 'witch's castle'.

narrative_arcs.title: Life Debt and a Sacred Dagger
Reason for Silence and Parting Ways
Arrival and Ominous Welcome to Hi-toun
The King's Plea for His Missing Daughter
A Desperate Mother and a Witch's Castle
Entering the Witch's Castle and Unveiling the 'Children'

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Defeat and Princess Lotus Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a seemingly unrelated capture scene, but it is implied to be Marco Polo's adventure, leading to the rescue of Princess Lotus and a royal reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Fire Attack and Escape Attempt
The Fly Blade Attack and Ogress's Downfall

Major_Arcs.title: The Tale of Treasure and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a cautionary tale about treasure, focusing on betrayal, revenge, and the deadly consequences of greed.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Treasure Tale
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a narrator who sets up a story about treasure, violence, and death.

sub_scenes.title: Penal Colony Plot and Captain's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces prisoners in a penal colony, a treasure proposition to the Captain, and subsequent betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Captain Brooking's Inquiry to Officer Jordan
Return to England and Renewed Vengeance

sub_scenes.title: Revenge and Deadly Confrontation in the Attic
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's elaborate revenge plan, leading to a deadly confrontation in Captain Brooking's attic over the treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Police Investigation and Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the police response to the gunshot and concludes the treasure tale with a moral lesson.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Capture of a Suspect
Police Observation and Homicide Squad Call
Moral of the Tale: Money as Evil

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the mystery of the haunted Matthews estate, focusing on Henry Northrup's investigation and confrontation with a vengeful spirit.

sub_scenes.title: Dr. Styx and The Haunted Estate Problem
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and Vincent Matthews' sentencing, leading to the realtor seeking help for the haunted Matthews estate.

narrative_arcs.title: Northrup's Expected Arrival and Supernatural Expertise
Eerie Warning at the Old House

sub_scenes.title: Confronting Vincent Matthews' Ghost and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Henry Northrup entering the haunted house and confronting the ghost of Vincent Matthews, leading to a resolution through forgiveness and brotherly love.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Haunted House and Confronting Vincent Matthews
Questioning Violence and Nature of Fear
Confession and Desperate Plea for Love
Physical Restraint and Assertion of Power
Summoning Rosalind and the Opportunity for Redemption
Request for Forgiveness and Millennial Release
Demand for Brotherly Love and Ultimate Freedom

Major_Arcs.title: The Voyages and Mutiny of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical voyages of Henry Hudson in search of the Northwest Passage, culminating in mutiny and his tragic fate.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Hudson's Fate and First Commission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up Henry Hudson's story with a glimpse of his tragic end and then transitions to his commission by the Dutch East India Company.

narrative_arcs.title: The Strange Fate of Henry Hudson

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Disappointment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hudson's first voyage, crew discontent, exploration of the Hudson River, and eventual return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Weeks at Sea and Crew's Discontent
Hudson's Reflection on Failure and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Wintering, and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes Hudson's second voyage, getting trapped in ice, wintering, and ultimately facing mutiny from his crew.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting Up a New Voyage for the Northwest Passage
Ship Stuck in Ice and Winter Quarters
Ice Melts and Crew's Demand to Return Home
Forced Adrift and Abandonment of Hudson
Arrest of the Mutineers Upon Return

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan the Arabian Knight and the Tartar Challenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Hassan's quest to rescue a kidnapped woman from Tartar horsemen, facing a challenge from their leader, Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Hassan and the Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan in action, being tasked by the Caliph to rescue a kidnapped woman from the Tartars.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Introduction of Conflict
The Caliph's Summons and Mission Briefing
Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Journey and Anticipation of the Oasis
Discovery of Tartar Tracks at the Oasis
Encounter with a Traveler and Dire Warning

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Confrontation at Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's stealthy approach to the Tartar camp, infiltration, and initial confrontation with guards.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambush and Subjugation of the Sentry
Inside the Tartar Camp - Search Begins
Suspicion and Confrontation by Tartar Guards

sub_scenes.title: Challenge, Duel, and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in Hassan's confrontation with Kurgan, accepting a challenge, fighting Tartar warriors, and ultimately rescuing the woman.

narrative_arcs.title: The Contest Begins and Hassan's Dirt Strategy
Hassan's Victory Over Two Tartar Warriors
Kurgan Honors His Word and Departs
Questioning Hassan's Affection and a Blush
A Farewell Kiss and a Fine Reward
